column1: d)  the 4th respondent is estopped from claiming back wages under MM 1-1 salary
e)  the 4th respondent is not entitled to obtain back wages considering his behaviour;

f) 
the 3rd respondent has failed to appreciate the ‘Terms of Reference’ correctly.
Thus, this Court is inclined to issue a  writ of certiorari quashing the award  of the 3rd

respondent  dated  21.11.2022  marked  as  P-12(b)  and  the  same  contained 
in  the
Extraordinary Gazette Notification bearing No. 2312/05 dated 27.12.2022.

T
his application of the Petitioner is therefore allowed.
President of the Court of Appeal
Judge of the Court of Appeal
